Dear Guests, 

we kindly ask you not to give us flowers! 

Two days after the wedding, we head out to our honeymoon, 
so we won't look after them anyway. 
Insted we'd rather have a bottle of tasty wine, so as to cheer up the next 90 years, we will spend with each other. :)

12th August 2017 
at 17:00 
othere will be a wedding 
in Church of The Holy Michael Archengel 
(Kościół Parafii św. Michała Archanioła) 
Płockiej Street 17, Płońsk. 

If you had been given from us 

a proper invitation, 
we will celebrate the wedding together right after the ceremony 
in a wedding hall 
PERŁOWY DWÓR 
Nowe Olszyny 29A, Załuski.
CLOSE
Do you like this app? 
Do you want to have it on YOUR wedding? 
Or maybe you have some suggestions? 

Just contact me! :)
